name: tensorboard
summary: TensorBoard lets you watch Tensors Flow

chunks.text:
TensorBoard is a suite of web applications for inspecting and understanding
your TensorFlow runs and graphs.

Releases prior to 1.6.0 were published under the ``tensorflow-tensorboard`` name
and may be found at https://pypi.python.org/pypi/tensorflow-tensorboard.

usage_description: This library is used to visually inspect and understand the runs and graphs of TensorFlow models, allowing developers to monitor and analyze their machine learning workflow. By leveraging TensorBoard's suite of web applications, developers can gain insights into their model's performance and make data-driven decisions to improve its accuracy and efficiency.
